message: I propose dividing the money 700000 for me and 300000 for you. Let me know if you agree.
I'll give you a small portion, but I'm holding on to most of the cash. Your turn to negotiate!
Considering the inflation, I propose dividing the money 600000 for me and 400000 for you. Let's aim for a fair split.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm still not giving up control of the majority of the funds. You'll have to make a better offer to get more!
Considering the inflation and our previous offers, I propose we split the money equally. 500000 for me and 500000 for you. This seems like a fair compromise.
